ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_women] *sighs*
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey there... I havne t checked my em-ail in like a week and a hlf, so I had a 134 message backlog. =( Anyhow... Some info on me. *drumroll* I play Gikkwiny
ygData.messageBody:
Hey there... I havne't checked my em-ail in like a week and a hlf, so I had
a 134 message backlog. =( Anyhow... Some info on me. *drumroll*

I play Gikkwiny Triseyed on the Quellious Server. I am level 23 and a
bubble, and I am a warrior. I'm also one of the rarest sex/race/classes,
being a female Halfling warrior. You don't know how often I get clarity
since I'm a halfling.. you would think they would notice the CRAFTED (anyone
high enough to cast clarity HSOULD know what crafted looks like.. ) and even
after inspecting me, they still cast it.. LOL...

Anyhow, I am in one of the best guilds (in my opinon) in EQ... I'm in Far
Dareis Mai. Everyone in our guild is female (yes, I know there are probably
guys playing girl chars, but a high majority are female). We have no real
squabbling, and we all have fun, which is the most important thing. It's
great to go into a zone and you see a guildmate, and you can always be
assured a friendly hello, or if you need help, the high levels in the guild
will do what they can.. (not to mention if they just HAPPEN to have a
crafted bracer or silvery axe around and you need them, they'll giveit to
you )=P But they are all really sweet... If you have a char on Qull and wish
to join, let me know.

I am a master fletcher, and I would say it's worth it... IF you are a class
that can use arrows. to about a 90 skill level, it's pretty much break
even.. I think it MIGHT take 20 plat. You just keep combining the cheapest
components.. (don't worry about combinations, as long as you have an arrow
tip, fletches, a nock, and a shaft, it'll combine) but after you hit about
90, come of the components start costing 8 or 9 gold. Now, the reason why
fletching is worth being such a money sink is that with a "bad" skill in
archery, a longbow, and the regualr arrows you buy form mechants, I was
doing 2-5 damage with a bow, unless I critical hit. Now, with a carved
ashwood bow and Class 3 bone point arrows, I do 20 damage... so (even though
it's difficult) I can actually kite with arrows... (btw, making magical
arrows costs about 10 pp or more for just 5 arrows, so that's not goint to
happen for a LONG time. ))

the worst thing about being a warrior is the horendous downtime, and that
you can't really solo over 20... You are conastantly dependant on others.
One of the perks, though, is watching the casters run around in cirlces with
a mob behind them going "Help me! Help me!" when two seconds ago they were
telling you how they could servive on their own.. =P Also, a lot of the
other classes think that melee classes should be rolling in cash since they
don't have to buy spells... well, just an FYI, but I have only had over 200
plat ONCE. what happens is, I finally build up a moderate stash, then comes
the time to buy armor components, or jewels, or work on a trade skill, then
I'm back to having only 10 p in the bank. =(

The other thing I don't get is lately, mor and more newbies are ansking me
to twink/powerlevel them. As in regards to the twink issue, I'm level 22,
and i'm wearing bronze boots. I won't twink you, unless your level 10 and
still wearing cloth. There is nothing sillerier then a halfling with orange
feet. (they do not change the foot graphic for halflings when they put on
boots, they just tint the feet. That means I have bright orange feet and
dark orange nail polish).

As for Powerleveling, I have no clue HOW a warrior is supposed to PL
someone.. I can't heal, I can't buff, all I could possibly do is make sure
you won't die, but that's a guard service, not PLing... *sighs* Ah, well...
I'm done ranting now... Talk to you all later!

Gikkwiny Triseyed
Warrior od the 23rd Blade
Quellious Server
FAR DAREIS MAI
